timeline.message:
Fetch dynamic filters continuously

A new task resource endpoint is added
that provides task collected dynamic filters.
Dynamic filters are versioned and only
new dynamic filters are returned.
Dynamic filters version is obtained continuously
as part of TaskStatus request.
